page.title: 10TRANSPORT IN AREA (CONT)
page.content:
This table shows one of the only two bus routes being operated regularly in this area (by private contractor) as at 1st July '85.
DUDLEY'S COACHES LTD. RADFORD INKBERROW TIME AND FARES TABLE
To Pershore (Weds.only) Single Return from
9.15 am Rous Lench 35p 65p 9.15 am Abbots Morton 35p 65p 9.15 am Inkberrow 35p 6Op 9.2O am Abberton 35p 6Op 9.3O am Bishampton 3Op 5Op 9.4O am Throckmorton 3Op 5Op 9.5O am Pinvin 2Op 3Op 1O.OO am arrive Pershore 12.OO noon return from Broad Street Pershore
